text:
e="preserve">Aishwarya Pisse is an Indian actress. She works mainly on Kannada, Telugu and Tamil television series. She is recognized for her roles in the following shows: "Punar Vivaha" (Kannada), "Anuroopa" (Kannada), "Ninaika Therintha Manamae" (Tamil), "Agni Sakshi" (Telugu) and "Kasthuri "(Telugu). She also appeared in a two Kannada Movies named "Srikanta" and "Santhu Straight Forward."
She played the role of Gowri in "Agni Sakshi" (Telugu)
She is married to Telugu,Kannada and Tamil Television Actress Navya Swamy's brother Hari Vinay.
She has worked for Star Maa, Star Suvarna, Vijay TV, Zee Kannada, ETV Telugu, Udaya TV and Colors Kannada till now.
